titleInfo.title: Finite temperature meson masses with improved quenched Wilson fermions

mods.abstract: We present recent results for meson screening masses with quenched Wilson fermions above and below the confinement-deconfinement phase transition. The action used in the simulation is the Sheikholeslami Wohlert action. The quark masses are chosen to be in a range going front light quarks up to the mass of the charm quark. These results are compared with zero temperature Wilson and high temperature staggered data.
